page.title: 19BOWDEN VILLAGE
page.content: BOWDEN IS QUITE A BIG VILLAGE BUT, IT HAS QUITE A LOT OF HISTORY IN IT, BECAUSE THERE ARE SOME VERY OLD PLACES.THERE ARE PLACE'S IN BOWDEN WHICH HAVE JUST BEEN BUILT AS WELL.FIRST ONE OF THE OLDEST PLACE'S IN BOWDEN IS A COTTAGE IN MANOR ROAD.IT'NOT ACTUALLY ON MANOR ROAD,THERE IS THE HAIRDRESSERS ON MANOR ROAD.A LADY CALLED MRS VERNON LIVES IN A HOUSE ON MANOR ROAD AND BEHIND HER HOUSE THERE IS A COTTAGE WHICH IS THE OLDEST PLACE IN BOWDEN.THE NEWEST PART IN BOWDEN ARE THESE ARE THE OLD PEOPLE'S AND OUR SCHOOL.THEY ARE UP GUNNSBROOK CLOSE THAT IS THE NEWEST PART OF GREAT BOWDEN.
